name: Mid South

distances.name: 100-Mile Gravel
distances.description: Typically 5,000-6,000 ft total gain via repeated short punchy climbs

distances.name: 50-Mile Gravel
distances.description: Often slightly long, GPS shows ~56 miles with rolling terrain

terrain.description: Continuous rolling terrain with frequent short, punchy climbs rather than big ascents, consistent with Cross Timbers topography

typical.conditions: Spring Oklahoma weather, variable conditions possible

uniqueCharacteristics: Formerly known as 'Dirty Kanza' founder's Oklahoma event
All Bodies on Bikes inclusive ethos
Mega Mid South bikepacking ultra (300-301 miles, 15,500-18,000 ft) as separate related event
notes: NOT included in 2026 Life Time Grand Prix points schedule
